articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: EU's Call of Duty: Probe Microsoft-Activision Blizzard deal - BNN Bloomberg
articles.description: The European Union has launched an investigation into Microsoft's planned takeover of video game giant Activision Blizzard, fearing the US$69 billion deal would distort fair competition to popular titles like Call of Duty.
articles.content: The European Union has launched an investigation into Microsoft's planned takeover of video game giant Activision Blizzard, fearing the US$69 billion deal would distort fair competition to popular ti… [+4291 chars]

articles.title: At Least 15,000 Killed By Heat Wave In Europe This Year: WHO - NDTV
articles.description: At least 15,000 people have died in Europe because of hot weather in 2022 so far, the World Health Organization said Monday, with Spain and Germany among the worst-affected countries.
articles.content:
At least 15,000 people have died in Europe because of hot weather. (File)
